translations: 热的，热量的；温度的；热电的

sentences.sentence: Mixed techniques of laser, thermo cutting & broderie work create novelty embroideries with a pseudo fragility.
sentences.translation: 混合高科技，激光，热切割，挑孔技术创出新刺绣概念。

sentences.sentence: And you can use thermo to help you out.
So here we have kinetics. Here we have thermo.
sentences.translation: 那么这里我们有动力学，这里我们有热。
